attributes.action: Mental health medications to be sold without prescription charge
attributes.additional_details: People in UK are struggling more than ever with mental health problems, especially those suffering from isolation during COVID-19 pandemic. This is the best time to support those suffering with mental health conditions. World Mental Health Day 2020
attributes.background: Government to scrap prescription charge for mental health medications

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553376
